## payloadJsonProcessor() function

A helper to build a Snowplow request from a set of name-value pairs, provided using the add methods. Will base64 encode JSON, if desired, on build

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function payloadJsonProcessor(encodeBase64: boolean): JsonProcessor;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  encodeBase64 | boolean |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

JsonProcessor

The request builder, with add and build methods
